title: Transparent On Scotland's Future
itunes:title: Transparent On Scotland's Future
description:
Alan Brown, SNP MP for Kilmarnock and Loudoun says a win for his party at the next general election would be used to sit down and negotiate with Westminster. On Scotland's future, he tells Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Yuan Potts, it's important to keep things 'lawful and transparent'. Plus our interviews with the EU's chief Brexit negotiator, Maros Sefcovic and Roger Bootle from Capital Economics. And, ahead of London Pride weekend, we speak to former Lloyds of London CEO Inga Beale. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
